main.name: Vijay Nara
main.bio: Hi there! I am a skilled Desktop Administrator with an experience of more than 4 years in IT Industry in the field of Application development, Desktop Administration and Service Desk(technical support). I have good command over technical, vocal and logical requirements of IT Industry. I have exerpience working with or for multiple organizations particularly in the following fields:- Full Stack Development (C#, front end web development(HTML, CSS, php, JavaScript, React, React Native, Expo, Bootstrap), backend database management, Oracle Database Management, SQL, mySQL, fetching data via API(REST, GraphQL), Desktop Administrator and technical support (Windows 10, Enrolling Device in Endpoint Manager, imaging computers, Active Directory Management, Virtual Machines Management, Office 365 Products and licenses, Azure Active Directory, Adobe License Mangement, Application Management, Hardware and Software supports, Remote Control, Service-Now, Airwatch, iPhones, MacBooks, Androids, BYOD, tier-2, printers, etc.)
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you are looking for quality support!

education.degree: Diploma, Programmer Analyst and Web Development

work.title: Desktop Administrator
work.description: - Setup Computer Desks with equipment, provide technical support related to software, hardware, ticket management, vendor management, Shipment and Delivery of Equipment, etc.

work.title: Technical Support
work.description: - Provide Technical Support to multiple Service Desks regarding Application requests, service-now ticket management.

work.title: Technical Support
work.description: - Provide quality customer support for all incoming contacts (via call, chat, email or web ticket) for IT-related issues or requests

testimonials.text: Vijay is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship is remarkable
Learning with Vijay has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable by doing Projects
